page.title: 16FARMING.(TWO)
page.content: On every farm in our area there are at least two{tractors.}The most is five whilst the commonest make is {Massey-Ferguson.}Every{dairy farm}has} a{milking parlour}where the cows are milked up to 24 at a time. Then they have{grass-cutters, balers, trailers, {muck}or{slurry spreaders.}Some of the farms have their own{combine-harvester for their{grain crops}and{slurry {tanks.}On most farms only the family works on it, but on some of them there are up to 4 people working on them. At {hay}making time friends sometimes help and they are given beer, cider or money. At{silage}time the biggest farms hire{contractors}to help the because the machinery and equipment is so expensive and the work has to be done so quickly once the weather is right.
